item.title: Build LineageOS for Redmi Note 5 Pro
item.description: Before starting out the procedure, I would hihgly recommend building it on a high-spec VPS and not on your personal computer. You could try out the free-trial of Google Cloud Platform. The guide will assume you are on a Linux system. Please don’t try building on any other OS Installing required tools and libraries For this I recommend using the scripts from Akhil Narang’s script repo. I personally use a Ubuntu on a build server.
